Why Pristine Clean?

Locally owned and operated

As a local business rooted in Fortville, Indiana, we are dedicated to providing exceptional care for both our customers and our community.

Happy staff, quality cleans

We value and respect our staff. By ensuring all our employees earn a living wage, we guarantee exceptional work and satisfied customers

Quality service guaranteed

We strive to provide the highest level of quality, service and value to each and every customer. If you are not satisfied, please inform us.
